title: Nextflow process CODEX_findoptK_allchr repeats the same operation 24 times
body: It would be better to do it just once and then output the result to the next process, but currently, doing so stops the parallelisation across chromosomes (the segmentation process is only luanched on 1 chromosome).

title: All chromosomes must be present in the bed file
body: It would be better to check which chromosomes are in the bed file, and then run CODEX only on these chromosomes
